verses.verse: <S%H4905>Maschil<s%> of <S%H1732>David;<s%> A <S%H8605>Prayer<s%> when he was in the <S%H4631>cave.<s%> I <S%H2199>cried<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> with my <S%H6963>voice;<s%> with my <S%H6963>voice<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> did I make my <S%H2603>supplication.<s%>
I <S%H8210>poured<s%> out my <S%H7879>complaint<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him; I <S%H5046>showed<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him my <S%H6869>trouble.<s%>

When my <S%H7307>spirit<s%> was <S%H5848>overwhelmed<s%> <S%H5921>within<s%> me, then you <S%H3045>knew<s%> my <S%H5410>path.<s%> In the <S%H734>way<s%> <S%H2098>wherein<s%> I <S%H1980>walked<s%> have they <S%H2934>privately<s%> <S%H2934>laid<s%> a <S%H6341>snare<s%> for me.

I <S%H5027>looked<s%> on my <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3225>hand,<s%> and <S%H7200>beheld,<s%> but there was <S%H369>no<s%> man that would <S%H5234>know<s%> me: <S%H4498>refuge<s%> <S%H6>failed<s%> me; <S%H369>no<s%> man <S%H1875>cared<s%> for my <S%H5315>soul.<s%>
I <S%H2199>cried<s%> to you, O <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> I <S%H559>said,<s%> You are my <S%H4268>refuge<s%> and my <S%H2506>portion<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H2416>living.<s%>

<S%H7181>Attend<s%> to my <S%H7440>cry;<s%> for I am <S%H1809>brought<s%> <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H1809>low:<s%> <S%H5337>deliver<s%> me from my <S%H7291>persecutors;<s%> for they are <S%H553>stronger<s%> than I.

<S%H3318>Bring<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> out of <S%H4525>prison,<s%> that I may <S%H3034>praise<s%> your <S%H8034>name:<s%> the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> shall <S%H3803>compass<s%> me about; for you shall <S%H1580>deal<s%> <S%H1580>bountifully<s%> with me.
